title: Reciting last ayah of surah Kahf before going to bed to wake up for Tahajjud & Fajr Authentic?
transcript: jawad from the emirates he says when finding it difficult to wake up from for fajr or for tahajjud some people say recite the last ayah in surah tilkaf before you go to bed either once or a number of times and this would help you go to bed and wake up at the specific time this is totally bogus this is baseless it's not found in the quran or in the sunnah any proof that can back this up
